description: An insulated vest that is tough and comfortable for the journeys ahead. This insulated vest has tons of pockets and is tough and comfortable for the journeys ahead. Drop-in hand pockets secure small belongings, while the D-ring attachment allows you to clip on any extra adventure gear.
name: Columbia Sportswear Rad Padded Vest - Mens
